Reviews.Title: Great value for money
Reviews.Author: canyon trip
Reviews.Content: The LCD panel on this TV is the same as the one on A550 model. Several people have confirmed with Samsung. The difference in contrast ratio versus A550 is a typo apparently.What I like about this tv:-great picture quality (search avs forum for professionally calibrated settings for this TV. It made a significant difference in picture quality- good sound for everyday tv watching-good quality ATSC/QAM tuner ( I pulled in channels that I didn't I had)comparison vs A550:+ better sound because of side mounted speakers+ cheaper (though amzn had A550 for less than A530 at one point last month :)- does not have wiselink (view photos/mp3s from usn thumb drive)I dont care about viewing photos/mp3s too much so I went with the A530.Update:TV died on Jan 9 2009 (less than 5 months). The red power light keeps blinking and there is a flickering sound every few minutes. Amazon.com would not help after >30 days, so I called Samsung. They took down the info and sent it to a local repair shop (Precision TV in SF bay area). They still have not called me about it after 3 days <sigh>. Now I wish I had purchased it at a local B&M; shop with an extended warranty. I would have got a loaner at least. Now I am stuck with bad customer service. Pretty disappointed with Samsung quality.

Reviews.Title: 5 Star TV
Reviews.Author: Spencer Carruth Clark "Spencer Clark"
Reviews.Content: Hi Everyone,We recently purchased this TV, and I have to say it is GREAT. We got it primarily for our photography business - basically, to use it as a giant monitor for editing and to show photographs to clients. It is the exact look and feel we were going for.So far, everything has worked out perfectly. Particularly, it looks wonderful with our iMac putting video out to it at 1920x1080 @ 60 hertz via HDMI (mini-dvi to DVI to HDMI). It looks great as well with our Compaq PC laptop hooked up through VGA - again at 1920x1080 @ 60 hertz. I honestly don't see a difference on this model through VGA vs. HDMI, but I haven't run any comparison tests yet.The sound is really decent on this TV. We can set it at a volume to comfortably here it at 30 feet away without maxing out the volume. Though, we can also hook it up to our sound system to put out more sound / bass. It does have optical sound out which works just fine for this (or you could use the standard RCA red & white audio out).The display itself is absolutely crisp. We haven't tried customizing it yet, but there are a good bit of options for that as well. To give you an idea, a photograph on our 20" iMac looks just as good (if not better) on the 530 Samsung. There's no loss of color, blacks, or details. Originally, the images on the TV seemed to have a sharpening affect applied - we took down the sharpness on the Samsung and it is now spot on.I'd easily recommend this TV to anyone. It has all the inputs and outputs you'd need. The display is absolutely great (on par with an Apple screen - which is saying a lot). It has a nice, sleek feel to it (even the buttons are recessed and don't poke out). It is easy to use.Oh, one note: it is a 60 htz tv, not 120 htz. For us, we didn't want or need the 120 htz as we're primarly working with photographs. Really, movies and TV are still at 24 fps and 29.97 fps ... it'll be quite a while before they go higher than that (to 60 htz or 120 htz) ... at the moment I believe 120 htz movies are actually at 24 fps and then the 120 htz tv displays 5 frames per actual frame to make the movie appear smoother. Just some tech talk there.- Spencer

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Candy K. Paselk
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN46A530 46-inch 1080P LCD HDTVI was a little apprehensive about ordering an item like this online.  Amazon's price beat out the local places that I checked out so I went for it.I must say it was delivered earlier than expected and the guys set it up for us.  This tv is great.  Very clear picture.  No complaints at all.  There was a little band at the top like white pixels on the picture and I had read a review on some tv complaining about it so I was a little nervous. We read the manual and it told us how to tune the tv so the problem disappeared.  Just an adjustment problem, not a problem with the tv.  We bought a JVC a few months ago and were very happy with it till we got this one.  This one is  a much clearer, more vivid picture. I would highly recommend this tv, amazon, and their delivery service.  This was a very good purchase experience.

Reviews.Title: thrilled to be in an HD world
Reviews.Author: Hoosier Guy
Reviews.Content: (note: I bought this TV elsewhere, but I am grateful to the Amazon community for its reviews, so I wanted to add one)I found the process of researching and buying an HDTV to be overwhelming, but I am thrilled with the end result.The picture quality has been nothing short of stunning.  I'm sure that the black levels could be better on a high-end Sony, but for me they are excellent.  NBC's coverage of the Olympics has been luxurious to watch.  The colors are fantastic.There are a few times when I notice artifacts, such as with water polo and with the Olympic logo that flashes through between replays, but I can live with it.  I actually think that the reason is NBC's 1080i signal, because Fox's 720p signal for football and baseball has been flawlessly smooth.I am typing this on the TV screen, using it as my computer monitor, which has worked great through both the VGA port and the (DVI-to-)HDMI port.  Movies on an upconverting DVD player have looked great, and the big screen is lots of fun with the 480p component signal from our Nintendo Wii.Sound could be better, with the speakers being in the back as well as the sides, but it's as good as any other TV I've owned.  I would get a separate sound system if it really mattered to me.I found the setup to be easy, and it was a pleasant surprise to see that the TV could pick up the HD local channels through the cable, even though I just have basic standard-definition service.  The standard channels are much less attractive than the HD ones, but I'm willing to accept that in order to enjoy the HD.Knowing that 120hz technology and other features will be coming down in price, I think that this was an excellent purchase in terms of getting a good deal on features that are mature enough to enjoy right now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Even Better Customer Service From Amazon
Reviews.Author: P. Rogers
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV was great but a few days after arrival I noticed a stuck pixel. I did not want a brand new TV with defective pixels, so I called Amazon. They took the TV back and issued a full refund. Amazon has taken the risk and hassle out of shopping on the internet.

Reviews.Title: lARGER T.V. AT LAST
Reviews.Author: Joyce Ellen Brazel
Reviews.Content: WE REALLY LIKE THE QUALITY OF THE PICTURE AND LARGER THAN LIFE FEELING THAT YOU GET WHILE YOU WATCH IT. IT WAS SIMPLE TO HOOK UP ONCE MY EXPERT OF A SON-IN-LAW GOT A HOLD OF IT. THE CABLE MAN WAS LOST AND SO WERE WE, BEING OF AN OLDER GENERATION = 65+.  NONE OF THE DIRECTIONS ARE MEANT FOR A PERSON WHO HAS BEEN LEFT BEHIND ON THE ROAD TO PROGRESS!! WE ENDED UP WITH 4 REMOTES FROM THE CABLE MAN AND ONLY ONE FROM MY SON-IN-LAW. HOPE YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING OR HAVE SOME ONE WHO DOES. GOOD LUCK!  NOW EXCUSE ME, I HAVE TO GO WATCH A MOVIE. =)

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A530
Reviews.Author: E. N. McCoy "enmreal"
Reviews.Content: Samsung has a great product in this big screen LCD.  It has been great during this football season.  A lot better than my team has been.  This big screen LCD is everything it was advertised.  It has a much better picture than the Visio for not much more money.  The LCD reduces glare incredibly over a previously owned projection HD TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46A530 HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ralph W. Pratt
Reviews.Content: Excellent product in all respects. I researched many 46 inch sets and I believe this was the best buy. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Ruben Puente
Reviews.Content: very sharp picture even without hd service of which I will probably get in the near future but for now this tv is great.

Reviews.Title: my experience
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Mills
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, everything we could ask for. It is big colorful and the resolution is excellent. The sound is great. Thanks for having this great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Rozmus "MBR"
Reviews.Content: We completed alot of research and decided on this TV, however found it very hard to find in a store. We got frustrated, found it on line, and saved money on the tv by doing that. Very happy with the TV!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the tv
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Brandolo
Reviews.Content: 4 stars not 5 - I'm decreasing my rating.Just got the tv Feb 2009.  I love it !  I am completely satisfied.  I'm not sure why you need to pay for more features.  This tv should suffice any normal viewer.UPDATE: I returned this tv (the 530 model) and got the Samsung 46 inch 650 - there is no comparison !!!!  The picture on the 650 is stunning.  The picture on the 530 is good.  If you haven't bought yet, you need to get the Samsung 650 !!!

Reviews.Title: Sounds Great To Me...
Reviews.Author: Tomac
Reviews.Content: Only gave it a four since this is my first large tv, but am very pleased with it. My biggest concern was not having to buy additional eqpt such as a sound system (next xmas). The sound was better than expected based on other reviews of other TVs that scared my decision process along with features. The sound is just as good as any stereo TV I have had, the volume can be quite loud without losing quality, and the in-tv surround does add a little upgrade when watching DVDs. I did spring for a cheap HDTV DVD player and yes indeed there is a difference as to picture quality. Almost bought a 52" and glad I didn't would have been too big for the space. LR was 18'X 22. For the price $1100 including inside delivery cannot complain. If you are going to mount on wall do buy the swivel ($$$) as you don't want to have to take the tv down just to hook things up. Most tv's are rear connections.p.s Do not use mount kit bolts unless they are graded and not cheap knock offs. Mine snapped and had to start all over.

Reviews.Title: lcd tv
Reviews.Author: Steven Jacobowitz
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear.  The tv is reliable.  The screen reflects light so it should be used in a dark room.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Christopher L. Losh
Reviews.Content: This buy goes to show that it pays to watch the web....this TV was on sale at amazon for only 3 hours....so I snagged it up!! What a TV!!  Could have spent more on it's big brothers, but couldn't beat the price.  Picture is gorgeous!  Size was perfect choice for the room I put it in.  Samsung makes a great product!  Could have spent less on a different brand, but would have gotten the same spectacular and world class quality.  Need I go on?

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: M. Butcher "Katydids"
Reviews.Content: Clear, crisp image with easy to use controls and settings.  Good sound and several easy-to-access connection points.  The only dissatisfaction comes when you change channels.  It takes a few seconds to "search for signal" before it brings up the new channel image and sound.  This can be bothersome for a "channel surfer" or trying to go back and forth between two or more sporting events.  It is not a deal breaker, but it's not something I had to deal with on the old large screen rear projection TV this replaced.  Overall, I'm still very happy and glad I made the switch.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: S. Lisle
Reviews.Content: Delivery took a little longer than my smaller Amazon.com orders, but it was worth the wait. It was also nice that I could schedule the delivery on a day that worked for me. Great picture, easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Really pleased with this TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Huffman
Reviews.Content: My review if based on a price of $1099.99, not sure if they'll drop the price again. Keep a look out.Wonderful TV. Beautiful picture. Pretty good sound (better to use alternate sound, but not necessary)Great value at the price. Performs as well as the Sony equivalent but for several hundred dollars less.I have a Sony upscaling dvd player, an Xbox 360 and an indoor directional antenna for HD signal over air.  All work great, especially the 360. Playing Mirror's Edge and COD4 on it is fantastic.Plenty of inputs. The laptop looks great on it through the VGA input. I've used the streaming Netflix with the computer to great effect.Can't recommend this TV enough at the price point.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied With Samsung
Reviews.Author: Roberto Silva "Flaco Johnson"
Reviews.Content: This TV is one of the best investments I've ever made. I bought it as a gift to myself and I couldn't be happier. I used to never watch TV. Now I can't stop. Everything is perfect. I do feel sorry for the people who paid full price for this though. I got my at a local Circuit City for $1169 with their open box deals. That's what I call a steal. Thanx Circuit City. Samsung is the Sh**!

Reviews.Title: Great HD Clarity, Even better price
Reviews.Author: A. Tam
Reviews.Content: Amazons white glove delivery is just GREAT. They set it up, plug it in, any problems? give them or Amazon a call and they will ship it back.What I like:-Don't let the 5 series foul you, the picture qualtiy is jaw dropping-Black levels are deep and distinguishable-ATSC/QAM tuner is great, got more Channels than I knew I had-The Plug and Play option makes it quick and simple to start. (programs channels, time, and pre-adjusted settings)-Sleek, simple, and sharp looking-The remote has a backlit feature-Comes with a cleaning clothCons:-PiP only works when you have 2 different sources running. (I.E) TV and XBOX 360,-Speakers are on the back instead of the sides (not too bad if you change the settings)There aren't many negative issues with this TV. Consumer Reports rate this one of their favorite. I think its "The best bang for the buck." Eventhough this TV might be last years model, it delivers great quality other brands lack.Although 120hz is the next level or standard when it comes to HDTV (240hz is out also) 60hz is more then enough for everyday watching.The TV did not lag when the NBA game was on, nor did it lag when playing the fast paced games on the Xbox 360.Overall its a Great TV! No wonder Samsung is on Top of the list

Reviews.Title: excellent tv but beware if you have several AV devices
Reviews.Author: Hernan Miranda
Reviews.Content: i recently bought this tv and let me tell you the image is excellent. i never actually thought that i could get so much quality at this price. the only downturn for me is that is still have a lot of AV devices and this tv lacks on that. i've only found one and it is a side one. so if you are like me (that still has a lot of AV systems) this tv is a bit of a bummer (i hate swapping cables). apart from that the set is great, love the swivel stand. i honestly dont know what good can i get from 120 hz as of today.

Reviews.Title: TV worked great for 20 months......
Reviews.Author: Jeff S.
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV when it works.  Before buying one, I'd recommend you Google search "Samsung TV Clicking"  There is a problem with the Samsung TVs made recently.  They put in cheap capacitors that do not last.My TV just started acting up a few day ago.  It makes a clicking sound for about 5 minutes before the picture comes on.  I called Samsung today and they admitted that this is a common problem with their TVs and agreed to send a local tv repairman out to me free of charge and if it is the defective capacitors, Samsung will pay to have it fixed.  But they will only do this once.  So...  Hopefully they don't put the same cheap capacitors in.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: MEL SHERR ""man without toy's is sad'"
Reviews.Content: received 46" Samsung HD tv by courier picture quality super, plug and play is very easy auto searches for signal and channels. Ordering from Amazon is a wonderful experience.

ProductInfo.Features:
5ms Response Time
20,000:1 contrast ration, 5MS response time, Super Clear Panel Technology
3 HDMI, 2 Component, + 1 PC Input
10W x 2 audio output
Swivel Stand
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung LN46A530 46-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV
